name: Owl Pop Blast
description:
GuGu the Owl and his buddies, invite you to play a super fun game together!

In each game, they stand in random positions and you need to find 2 or more owls that are next to each other and of the same color! The more owls of the same color you find each time, the higher your score! Finally, please do not let any owl can not find a companion, this will lead to your game failure ~!



Owl Pop Blast is a wonderful casual game for people who want to kill time, reduce pressure and train brain!



Features

● Super decompression gameplay: point and click that eliminates, easy to start, to play well also need some skills

● super cute owl: cute shape, cool animation, every click brings happiness

● Challenge BigBang: Eliminate more blocks at once to get a higher rating

● No time limit: GuGu is very patient, you have plenty of time to think about the next plan.

● Break through the level record: you can get a generous reward for each level you pass, challenge the limit and break through yourself!

● Magic props: Lighting Tool can randomly eliminate 5 squares; Hammer Tool can eliminate 1 specified square; Color Tool can convert the color of specified squares; Reset Tool can re-randomize the position of all squares

Download and play the game for free now!
